hero-description: Based in Panama, I'm a front-end developer ready to make an impactful change in your business by transforming raw code into visually stunning, responsive designs and intuitive user experiences.
about-description-1: I'm a front-end developer with a serious passion to offer great UI/UX.
about-description-2: Well-organized person, problem solver, with a keen eye to details. I take pride in delivering fast, responsive sites. Gamer, TV lover and fan of a nice evening with a cup of coffee and good music.
contact-description: Looking for a reliable, skilled and talented front-end developer? I'm looking forward to be a part of a team and help your business succeed.
name: Name
